title: 10 Simple Steps to Write in Italics on WhatsApp

steps.title: Tap CHATS.
steps.content: Tap CHATS . It's at the bottom of your screen.

steps.title: Tap the conversation you wish to add italics to.
steps.content: Tap the conversation you wish to add italics to.

steps.title: Tap the text field.
steps.content: Tap the text field. This is at the bottom of the screen. Tapping it will open up the keyboard.

steps.title: Type your message up until the point where you wish to start the italics.
steps.content: Type your message up until the point where you wish to start the italics.

steps.title: Add an underscore.
steps.content: Add an underscore. This is the beginning of the italics tag. On an iOS device, the underscore is found by tapping the 123 button or the .?123 button, then the #+= button. Tap the _ . It is the first button from the left on the second row of buttons. On an Android device, the underscore is entered by pressing and holding on the Y key until the alternate press option appears, then releasing it.

steps.title: Type the section you wish to be italicized.
steps.content: Type the section you wish to be italicized. Do not enter a space between the underscore and the first letter of the italicized section.

steps.title: Add an underscore at the end of the section you wish to have italicized.
steps.content: Add an underscore at the end of the section you wish to have italicized. This ends the italics tag. Do not enter a space between the end of the italicized section and the underscore. The text between the underscores will now appear italicized in the textbox.

steps.title: Continue typing the rest of your message.
steps.content: Continue typing the rest of your message.

steps.title: Tap the send arrow.
steps.content: Tap the send arrow. The message will appear in the conversation history. The text will appear italicized without the underscores at either end of the italicized section.
